title: NIIST Notification 2025 - Walk-in interview for Medical Officer Posts
description: The National Institute for Interdisciplinary Science and Technology (NIIST) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 01 Medical Officer Posts. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their MBBS can apply for the NIIST Notification 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned the education details, age limit, sele...
